entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
